title: MSI teasing a handheld gaming PC like the Steam Deck
description: Begun, the handheld wars have. It seems like every company now wants a piece of the pie doesn't it? Even MSI appear to be jumping into the fold now with an announcement due at CES 2024.

title: Mobile Suit Baba combines Baba Is You puzzling with Into the Breach strategy
description: Indie developer Hempuli Oy has released a follow-up to their incredible puzzle game Baba Is You, this time taking the idea of Into the Breach from Subset Games and putting a new spin on it with Baba Is You word rules.

title: Bodycam horror shooter Chasmal Fear looks like a riot
description: MystiveDev emailed in about Chasmal Fear, an upcoming horror shooter you play as if you're viewing it from a bodycam set in an underwater facility.

title: dotAGE now Steam Deck Verified and sold over 30K copies
description: Showing that the indie dream for some is alive and well, the merciless survival roguelite turn-based city builder has managed to sell over 30,000 copies in three months. It's also now Steam Deck Verified!

title: Linux Mint planning an upgraded EDGE ISO with kernel 6.5
description: For people wanting to install Linux Mint on newer devices, the Linux Mint team have announced a plan to update their EDGE ISOs with a later Linux kernel in the latest blog post.

title: Jazz Jackrabbit 2 reimplementation gets a new release with Flatpak support
description: Jazz Jackrabbit 2 is a much loved classic that continues to live on thanks to the Jazz² Resurrection project, with a new release that went live recently bringing Flatpak support.

title: SteamOS 3.5.12 Preview and new Steam Deck Beta and Steam Desktop Beta released
description: Catching up from the end of the holidays, Valve recently released SteamOS 3.5.12 Preview and today there's also a new Steam Deck and Desktop Beta release.
